steps.title: Activate measurement requirement
steps.description: Select in the product pages if measurements are required for the clothing.

steps.title: Receive Measurement From Customers
steps.description: See all your customers current measurements and body type insight to quicken and simplify the cloth development.

steps.title: Create Your Size Guide
steps.description: Set the charts, size ranges and the allowances for each clothing fit.

steps.title: Auto review & calibrate
steps.description: See the chart, auto-checks, and confidence ranges. Add notes or request specific re-shots.

steps.title: Save Or Share With Customers
steps.description: Save to your lookbook, or forward to a vendor for final adjustments and production confirmation.
